title: Science for the tropics
creator_contributor_role: Technical and Scientific Films, production company
subject_group: Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Natural resources

Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Crops and soils
description: A look at the work of the Tropical Products Institute in London, an organisation which assists third world countries to exploit their natural resources commercially. The Institute also does much laboratory work relating to agricultural issues. The film contains quite technical examinations of several projects the Institute has been involved in.
